awards.title: National Scholarship
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
awards.summary: The National Scholarship is a award established by the Central Government to encourage students at regular undergraduate colleges, higher vocational colleges, and higher technical colleges to study diligently, strive for excellence, and develop comprehensively in terms of morality, intelligence, physical fitness, and aesthetics.

awards.title: Annual Scholarship of National Astronomical Observatories, Chinese Academy of Sciences
awards.summary: To promote the innovative development of China's astronomical endeavors, encourage undergraduate students in study to be diligent, studious, courageous in innovation, and committed to dedicating themselves to the astronomical field, the National Astronomical Observatories of the Chinese Academy of Sciences has established the ‘Annual Scholarship of National Astronomical Observatories, Chinese Academy of Sciences’ at multiple related domestic universities, to reward outstanding undergraduate students majoring in astronomy and related disciplines.
